import React, {useState}from 'react' import LogoApp from '../../assets/img/imad.png' import ConnectMethod from './ConnectMethod' export default function Inscriptions() { const [displayMethodToConnect, setDisplayMethodToConnect] = useState(false) const displayMethod=()=> setDisplayMethodToConnect(!displayMethodToConnect) return (

Insérer Slogan qui tue ici
